topics.body:
One piece is very imaginative.

So far the straw hat pirates have encountered

A Clown pirate with the ability to remove his limbs from his body and have them float around.

A Group of Fishman pirates.

A Marine captain who's made of smoke.

A Fucking huge whale.

A man who can make his boogers explode.

A duo of giants that have been fighting for centuries.

A man who can make Candle wax that's harder than steel from his body.

A Reindeer man who's also a really good doctor.

And A Ballerina man who can impersonate anyone.

I've left out a few things.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5540751e6368724fbf943100#post_5540751e6368724fbf943100

There's also the bush guy trapped in a treasure chest and a God trapped in a man's body (Usopp)
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5540751e6368724fbf943100#post_5540751e6368724fbf943100
A perveted crab
A mole woman
A fat guy with a four ton baseball bat
A guy made of fire
A woman made of spikes
A guy who's body is steel
A literal Sandman

Okay, like, I legitimately love dragon ball z and I'm happy it's such a successful franchise

But how the hell did it beat jojo and one piece in America? Is The american audience just way less receptive of amazing crazy bullshit?

There will also be, spoilered btw... [spoiler]a man made out of ice like liquid nitrogen, a lightning god, a man with spring-coiled limbs, a world where dirt is valuable, an afro, zombies, cyborg animals, a man who can open a door through everything, a giraffe, a group of assassins, naked people, a sword that can turn into an elephant.[/spoiler]

Not in any particular order.
